snippet: GOLDSTEIN--Eileen P.,(Glickell), 72, of Purchase, NY on May 15, 2016. Adoring daughter of the late Isabel and Henry Glickell. Devoted wife of 52 years to Richard. Beloved mother of Gabrielle Goldstein and Felicia (Bruce) DePaola. Cherished grandmother of Tucker and Emma. Loving sister of Denise (Norman) Silverberg. Our hearts are broken. We will love and miss her forever. Donations in Eileen's memory may be made to: Naomi Berrie Diabetes Center nbdiabetes.org or JDRF. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDSTEIN, EILEEN P.
